profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Elite Roofing is a family owned and operated roofing company with over 13 years experience. Elite Roofing has been providing superior workmanship in roofing installation from one of the top shingle manufacturers in the Canada. Licensed and Fully Insured, our company is committed to providing you with the finest products, skilled workmanship and courteous service.

Honest, dependable and reliable, you can TRUST the experienced professionals at Elite Roofing. Providing you with superior customer service is a priority at Elite Roofing. We want you to know that we take your project seriously and we work hard to build a lasting and trusting relationship with our costumers.

Our Experienced team of Roofers and support staff specialize in: New Roofing, Roof Repair, Siding, Gutter Installation and repair.

Our excellent reputation and long list of satisfied clients attest to our superior craftsmanship, attention to detail, clear communication, honesty and integrity.

profile:
While located in Mississauga, Ontario Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. offers our renovation services all over the GTA even covering the Niagara region. We are a family run business, strongly committed to providing a high quality of craftsmanship and customer service to each and every customer, no matter the size of the job. Over eighty percent of our business is from repeat and referral customers. This success stems, in part, from the reputation GHSL Inc. has built over the past 3 years in business.
 
While other companies may send their representatives to your home, the owners of Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. personally estimates each job and works side-by-side with you on every aspect of your project from start to finish. We are a start to finish company we will get your work done in a timely manner and minimize any down time that may occur during your project.
 
Golden Horse Shu Living Inc. licensed and for your protection we carry both liability and WSIB for all of our workers and employees. Our Company stand behind all work performed and backs all projects with a full 1 year warranty.
 
GHSL Inc. offers comprehensive remodeling services and is dedicated to ensuring complete satisfaction on each and every job. Whether you want to remodel the kitchen or redo the bathroom, our team of professional craftsmen can transform your wish list into the reality of a beautifully remodeled home.

profile:
Gateway Roofing & Contracting Ltd is dedicated to providing the best service and they do everything they can to make sure you are completely satisfied with the work provided. Using the latest industry-approved practices to reinforce vulnerable and weak areas so your home is protected long after the work is done. 
 
Asphalt shingles may be their specialty but they are also experienced in eavestrough, soffit, fascia, siding, attic insulation & venting, skylights and much more. A harsh climate, bad architectural design, inadequate roof ventilation and lack of insulation can disrupt the function of your home causing roofing and waterproofing products to break down prematurely. They will identify these issues, educate you with a proper solution and provide a written estimate.
name: Gateway Roofing & Contracting Ltd

profile:
We are a renovation and construction company focused of on the important details of any job.  Whether we are laying one room of hardwood or building you a brand new house attention to how it is done and built so that it lasts is what we do.

Our team of experienced professionals are experts in what they do and know how to effectively apply their skills, workmanship and customer service excellence to assist you with your needs. Our knowledgeable staff is dependable, reliability and excel at offering personal service to all our customers.

Experts in Roofing, Siding, Gutters and Eavestroughs as well as Whole Home Renovations, Decks, Fences and Gates. Have a commercial property needing attending to? We are here for you as well!

Our company mission is to provide quality products and services at competitive rates. We are industry professionals and we are committed to listening to our customers to address your needs. We do it right the first time – we guarantee it.

We contribute our continued growth over the years to the quality of our workmanship, our selection of services and affordable rates. We take pride in the solid customer relationships we have built; our longevity in the industry is testament to our commitment to our customers.

Look forward to hearing from you!
specialities: All types of siding, roofing gutters as well as eavestroughs for both residential and commercial properties. Full interior renovations are also a specialty of ours that we take pride in treating each client as special and attending to their individual needs and desires. Decks, Fences or Gates? Yes, we are pros!
